name: QlikView Theme File
summary: Learn about .QVT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Several pre-installed themes are located in the \​Themes\​ directory of the QlikView installation. You can create new themes by selecting Tools → Theme Maker Wizard in the software.

description: Theme file used by QlikView, a business intelligence analysis program; contains information that specifies the layout and styles of document objects; used for changing the look and feel of QlikView documents (.QVW files).
